subject: Re: Hello
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Welcome Goddess!

 Guess I have to bow down, I'm only a Princess!

 "The guys" call me thier Purple Princess Kiera, and that comes 
through many of my contacts. 

 Frank-S



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Saqqara" <goddess_saqqara@...> wrote:
>
> Hello all, I am new to the group and I have uploaded an EVP file I 
made 
> with my new Digital Voice recorder in my bedroom this morning.  I 
had a 
> really kick butt one that I sent to TAPs.  A little girl, clear as 
a 
> bell but there was nothing I could do with it.  Hopefully TAPs can 
do 
> something with it.
> 
> Now, the file I put up, if you listen REALLY close when I ask a 
> question there are tiny bell sounds right after the question.  I 
have 
> another almost 10 minute EVP where I left the recorder in the room, 
no 
> windows or doors open and when I went in to turn it off there was a 
> very strong scent of old fashioned tea rose.
> 
> If anyone could bump up the 2nd one to see what the low voices are 
> saying that would be great, drop me an e-mail.  I am a sensitive 
but 
> would love to learn how to also use some equiptment to help me out.
> 
> Thank you 
> 
> Saqqara
>
